page.title: 19 MURDER,AND A GHOST
page.content: THERE HAVE BEEN TWO VIOLENT INCIDENTS THAT HAVE BECOME SOURCES OF LOCAL LEGEND.ONE OF THEM CONCERNED WITH THE{SUPERNATURAL,}THE OTHER WITH {LOCAL HISTORY.}OVER TWO CENTURIES AGO A WOMAN WAS KILLED,AS SHE ROCKED HER BABY TO SLEEP,WAITING FOR HER HUSBAND. LATER A VISITOR FOUND HER DEAD BUT THE BABY ASLEEP. A YEAR LATER HER HUSBAND KILLED HIMSELF. HE WAS BLAMED EVEN THOUGH THERE WAS NO PROOF. MANY PEOPLE HAVE SAID THEY HAVE SEEN THE{GHOST}OF MARY REVILL.IN 1783 FRANK FEARN WAS AN APPRENTICE FILESMITH WHO LIVED AT BRADFIELD. TRICKED A JEWELLER TO VISIT BRADFIELD HE WAS{MURDERED}BY FEARN WHO STOLE HIS WATCH.FEARN WAS ARRESTED AND EXECUTED AND WAS BROUGHT BACK TO BE HUNG NEAR THE CRIME. HIS BODY HUNG FOR 14 YEARS MANY PEOPLE ARE STILL AFRAID TO CROSS THE COMMON AT NIGHT.
